title: Who else stopped playing Summoners Rift when TFT came out?
body:
Really curious about this!

I haven't touched Summoners Rift ever since I started playing TFT. It feels like such a blessing not to get your game ruined over and over again by trolls/inters/afkers.

replies.body: no it's a trash rng game. I play alot of auto chess games, but tft is so terrible.

That's what someone that doesn't understand TFT would say.

If it was an RNG game, people would be going from iron to challenger and everything in between based on luck. Is that happening?
I just don't like the game. Now I would like to play the original game league of legends, and other auto chess games.
I did the exact same thing.  TFT is a step above SR.  I've played 2 SR games since TFT came out, and those were both because personal friends invited me.
I don't really like SR anymore but I'd have to be messed up in the head to quit it for TFT.
